document_data.name: Heldo Ubler
document_data.mainbody: '''Heldo Ubler''' was the no-good son of [[Thorm Ubler]], a mill-owner in [[Mistledale]]. Though he had never gotten into serious trouble, Heldo was known around [[Ashabenford]] as a braggart and a bully.
